sentences.en: For details of cheap excursion tickets, apply at the booking office.
sentences.cn: 关于廉价旅游票的详情, 可向售票处询问.

sentences.en: He shepherded us on an excursion.
I have arranged with my classmates for an excursion to the beach.
sentences.cn: 我已经跟同学们商量好去海滩远足的事.

sentences.en: Included in the tour is an excursion to the Grand Canyon.
sentences.cn: 这次旅游包括大峡谷观光。

sentences.en: Our class will make an excursion to the seaside.
She felt more than usually hungry after her excursion.
sentences.cn: 远足后，她比平时感觉更饿。

sentences.en: She went on excursion to the West Lake.
So I did. Quite an excursion that turned out to be, hey!
sentences.cn: 不错,那回后来还变成了一次不寻常的旅行.

sentences.en: The excursion was rounded off with a short visit to the zoo.
sentences.cn: 集体游览以匆匆参观一下动物园而圆满结束.

sentences.en: The excursion was the high spot of our holiday.
sentences.cn: 我们那个假日的最大乐趣是远足.

sentences.en: The excursion won't cost you a penny if you go with us.
sentences.cn: 如果你与我们一起去,这趟旅行就不会花你一文钱.

sentences.en: The little excursion had a good effect on Miss Quested's nerves.
sentences.cn: 这个小小的打岔对奎斯迪小姐紧张的神经倒很有好处.

sentences.en: They've gone on an excursion to York.
We also recommend a full day optional excursion to the Upper Douro.
sentences.cn: 我们还推荐去杜罗河上游的短途自选一日游。

sentences.en: We could not properly begin a pleasure excursion on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 我们不能在星期日正式开始漫游.

sentences.en: Your comments are an excursion from the major theme.

trans.tran_en: a short journey arranged so that a group of people can visit a place, especially while they are on holiday
